reviews.review_text: I am a software proffesional and was looking for a comfortable chair for my day to day work since i have to sit for work on laptop for long hrs. in day.After lot of search i found this awesome chair on Amazon and believe me i am really impressed about this nice chair.  i have ordered it for my primary work purpose and was expecting to get it by Rakshabandhan.Finally i got the chair one day before so thanks to the seller for fast delivery and made my Rakshabandhan memorable.There is a installtion guide pomplet inside the packaging which is self expalinary.It hepls really during the installation.I have installed this chair easily using that pomplet.The seller partner of this company Mr.Prerak was contacted me on whatsapp before get the chair and guided me during the installtion.He is really nice helpful person who helped me alot.
Very good quality product. Comfortable and very easy to assemble. Awesome  support from the seller.. Enjoyed their service and the chairs cushion are very much soft .
The chair is very comfortable. Takes a while to adjust the lumbar support cushion according to the inclination but once in the right place, gets very comfortable.
It is really comfortable and it was really easy to assemble. The seller was really cooperative too

Had to review as soon as I got this product as it was so supremely comfortable. Being a guy who is 6ft 1inches and almost 100kgs i was skeptical how sturdy it would be. But i was pleasantly surprised. Off course the look and the features attracted me as i didnt see Any other chairs as beautiful as this. But i was not sure if it would be sturdy and strong enough. Rest assured this is one of the strongest chairs i have experienced and will recommend it to all. Thanks amazon for the amazing chair and really great great stuff!
Loved the chair. Perfect and comfortable. It was nicely packed and properly delivered. The built is flawless and the design and color suits well.
Its too good and comfortable. And with a leg rest makes you way more comfortable. Chair even goes 180 degree
The best ever chair i used easy to assemble the quality is best while coming to comfort the Quicons are good and with best quality i recommend to order this
It is very comfortable chair and feels rich. I strongly recommend other customers to have a look on it. Assembling takes hardly 10 minutes

Bought this after covid lockdown for my work station. Still using this, has good lumbar support, looks cool and is strong af, been 2 years, no complaints. Would definitely recommend GreenSoul products

I bought this Greensoul Glance (GS-350) chair from Amazon after a detailed research. The website (greensoul) described this as a multi-functional chair, ie gaming+ergonomic. My need for a chair was only for long duration office work, and I went for this based on the advertisement. But all in all, I can say that the chair was a let-down
I love the chair.
The chair is no doubt solid. The ergonomics are good but the price of chair is higher compared to what we get. Can recommend this product to anyone neglecting the price.
Delivered on time and good package.
Easy to assemble with the instructions given in the package.
Product Name: Green Soul Glance Series Ergonomic/Gaming Chair

A really good looking and greatly comfortable chair.. I wanted to go for Monster ultimate because of the frog mechanism but did not find the right color available at that time and got this, though at the same price. This chair also does rock and has a inclination of 135 degrees which is more than enough. I got a complete Matt Black chair which I like most of my things in.. It's super comfortable.. I have it a star less as the assembly instructions were not really the best. I did understand them at first glance and was able to assemble within half an hour but i feel it's not really understandable for a lot of other people.. and for the price people pay a little bit of detailed instructions would be much better..
Been using this for a week, its comfortable and roomy. Very happy with the same. Built quality is very good.
The chair is totally comfortable and as was explained in the product detailing. Expensive, but end of the day - the comfort makes me forget that ...
Green soul ergonomic chair is very good for long duration sitting jobs. I have found it very comfortable and value for money.
This chair is amazing, I'm 6ft tall and this chair is perfect for me. It deserves more than 5star.
Worth the money.. Very Comfortable
Good ergonomic support. Value for money.
Ergonomic
It‚Äôs comfortable, designer and sturdy chair, 4d armrest, I am not good in reviewing things but overall experience is good till now

This chair is amazing. I got confused between old king of chair GS-734U and this newly released chair GS-350 but now I feel I made the right decision. Its very much comfortable and would recommend to people who want to do gaming for 3-4hrs after finishing 6-8hrs WFH. And in the end you will sleep on chair rather on bed. I really liked it and keep up guys, you guys did a good job in creating a unique chair designed for todays gamers or engineers working from home. Support from them on whatsapp and video call is unexceptional. Just got disappointed by delivery it took 13 days to deliver at 160km distance and this can definitely improved.

Just an ok product. Buy at your own risk. I purchased this chair (GS-320) directly via their website and after much delays (it took about 10 days to get item delivered to Bangalore from Bhiwandi, their warehouse) the product was finally delivered. Upon opening the package I found the item defective. There were cut marks at two places and immediately I sent the pictures to the seller via the FB messenger (also sent to their support email). Got response in messenger saying they will forward the matter to the concerned team and then no response after that.
After using it for 4 months I had an issue with the chair and back rest part needed replacement so they said I have to pay for everything what ever part is needed there is no warranty on any part

after using it for about 6 months I can say the chair itself is quite comfortable and very durable. The only problem is with the armrests which are really bad and alone bring down the comfort level of the chair.
overall chair is comfortable , very huge which is nice , but the lumbar support not good , can pain after long sitting hours
I received the product before date, which was very impressive.

I have been into gaming for longer duration since 2013 and i tried recliners/bean bags/chairs etc and i personally did not found any of them to be relaxing enough. I have tried some more gaming chairs but the design and comfort for this one is damn good.
Great chair worth it
Updating reviews after 7 months of usage. Overall good product, designed in India but
This chair is awesome for people with broad frame. For reference I am 6 feet tall and above avg built.

reviews.review_text: Recently ordered Kepler Brooks Oscar Ergonomic Gaming Chair after my older one broke and I have to say that Kepler Brooks chair has me very satisfied. For its price, it contains plenty of features that you see in more expensive brands yet the overall quality is good. The customer service also has been very helpful - right from informing when they shipped the chair to confirming if assembly went well and if there are any problems besides guiding through their registration/warranty process. In my case, one of the cover panels for left-side mechanism broke in transit & the team were quick to send a replacement asap. Overall I am very satisfied with the quality and the service provided.
I am posting this review after 7 days of usage. Feeling good and comfortable. Quality and appearance simply superb. I can recommend to buy this product without any doubt.

Although I didn't like the product at all, there is no doubt that the seller is very good. The return process was smooth and they have refunded me my amount. Highly recommend the seller, although not the product.

We bought this chair as a general office/study table chair and are very pleased with its performance. The product came on time and was well packed. There were no issues with the packaging and the parts were exactly as described in the instruction manual (except for a minor difference in shape of the allen wrench screw driver - the one in the package was better than the item described in the manual and worked well. Just wanted to mention it so that others know about the differnce).

Delivery and assembly was smooth, support from company (Mr. Kunal) and the service team was excellent. Minor issue on assembly was rectified by the support team  immediately. Service persons were professionals.
Please add assembly booklet, head rest need improvement
Looks like a 25k chair. Easy to assemble and comfortable as well.
Must appreciate seller  .  Very kind . Given his personal number in case any trouble in the chair.  My father likes the chair. Comfortable

I am writing this review after using this chair for about a month. The quality of chair is great. The customer support team was proactive to help during installation and support. Overall nice experience with the product.

Looks awsome,  comfortable, and overall feel good factor when I sit on this chair ..  the delivery was in tyme ..support staff was very good and soft spoken  .. technician was arranged to assemble the chair ..
Very satisfied with overall buying experience and comfort of the chair, responsive and exceptional customer support.

This is a review I am writing after a year, The chair is super comfortable and gives great back and leg support. It is very stylish - You can easily mistake this as a chair which would cost you north of 30K, but you are getting it for 50% less. The after sales team - my god ! It is the best, especially Prem and team have been in touch with me and helping me when I am away and my family is using this chair. They even serviced the chair for free. Not everyone does this ! I would buy more from Kepler !
When i received from amazon, i got a defective piece. Height adjustment was not working. Some parts were slight damaged.

I have been using the chair for 2 months now. The chair is excellent and very much comfortable. I sit almost 10 to 12 hours continuously for office work. Quality of the material is good and durable. Easy to assemble. It took me hardly 15 minutes to assemble. Support team is always in touch. The chair was shipped almost 3 days in advance with great care. All in all it's a very good product. It is a quality product, we need to handle with care. Not for rough use. Foot rest could have been a better. It is wobbly. One can get day to day comfort with long possible life.
Pros: like others mentioned. Overall  good. Customer service is top notch.
Great product with eay to assemble and great customer service.
As soon I placed the order,the dealer contacted me and promised to deliver soon.. very supportive customer service.
Looks good.. Strong and sturdy.. On the comfort side it's good but not great as the leather likes materials is not soft and irritates on long duration sitting

This chair is very good for home office usage and regular work. The back could have been taller and could have had a better contour for support, but that's about the only bad thing I can say for this chair. 4/5 üëå
Bought this chair 2 years ago.
The chair built is strong and it looks good. Its totally worth the money
The chair is confortable, only the arm rest is a bit shaky.
I found this chair which is Fortius Gray/White purchased for my wife as she was suffring from backpain. There are below points on which I found this is perfect chair for me üòÉ.
Worth the price.

Their customer service is exceptional and praiseworthy. I've used this product for two weeks, and both the quality of the product and the customer assistance are outstanding. The sole excuse for the return is that the high back chair I wanted was a little beyond my means.

I writing this review after 3months usage. Initially I wasn‚Äôt sure about the product. This was in my budget only on Amazon. Same product if you check in their website it as bit costlier. There were some issues with the product, but whenever I contacted them, they provided support immediately in a day.

I have purchased this in 2020, sept but started using regularly since March 2021 on daily basis...no complaint and any other defect..very comfortable for long hours..also once the stich was open ,i have called on the given number and Prem from Kepler has replaced the bottom section with a new peace by sending a person at home..the factory is in Sarajpur , Bengaluru and they provide very good service ..thanks happy with the product and service.

Comfortable and there is no issue , past 2wks im using . Bit noisy may be because its new but I don‚Äôt personally like the noise it‚Äôs disturb if you are on a call or meeting. Got 3yrs warranty hope that will help me out for long term use . Its nice for the price and looks is good
Bought this over a year ago in 2021, the chair has absolutely no issues so far. The chair is really comfortable, ergonomic, soft and the burgundy color looks just awesome.

Profuct arrived on Time via Blue Dart. And the chair was extremely well packed and assembly instructions were given too. It took 40 mins to assemble by myself and once done the chair was super comfortable and feels durable with the metal base. I HAD an issue with the height of the chair as im 6 foot tall hence the company sent me an entire new chair with the corrected height Gaslift which was insane since i used chairs from brands like greensoul monster and Cellbell Transformer series but both had certain defects such as the reclining function or loose armrests. This chair showed none of the issues mentioned above and was extremely comfortable too do mind that the seat has side bolsters that do touch your thighs but the padding more than makes up for it. And since the company is offering 3 years warranty, I have no worries for the future as Kepler Brooks has already shown me their level of customer service which i must say is extremely good. I highly recommend thus chair if your looking for a chair in the 13k price range as others wont have the features or customer service that this chair and brand offers. I really look forward to purchasing more products in the future.

product_name: Drogo Multi-Purpose Ergonomic Gaming Chair with 7 Way Adjustable Seat, Head & USB Massager, PU Leather Material & Lumbar Pillow | Home & Office Chair with Full Reclining Back & Footrest (3D Black II)

reviews.review_text: Ordered the Drogo 3D Carbon Fibre color with 4D arm rests. Here are my initial impressions within the first week
I got this chair for Rs.18000.
Confusing in the manual a bit but everything else is pretty fine
It is easy to assemble and mainly thr massage lumber when we connect it into a laptop...gives great feeling and massage well..
Good Product, Easy Assembly and Good build quality... Although the smell of the leather maybe a discomfort for sometime
N/A
Very good looking, nice build quality, Hard Liver (Chair back allows move according to seating arrangement) Foot rest have no use its only like one more extra features,
Its NOT a paid review. Pls note. I was skeptical about how this product would turn out to be after ordering.  Below is my honest review -
Product was very nice with premium look, very much satisfied by the Comfort ,Supportive base. Highly recommendable
Very much comfortable chair and eassy to assemble

I was looking for a robust and ergonomic chair at a reasonable price for my office setup and Drogo gaming chair seemed to be a best fit for all my requirements. So, I did placed the order and I had received the chair on time. It requires two persons to install this chair and it took me one and half hours to install it. This gaming chair contains neck pillow, lumber back and footrest which is super helpful at times when you have to take power nap. It got wing back mechanism and height adjustability which makes things easier for a tall person to sit comfortably. On the downside, this chair generates massive amount of heat while using it for a prolonged time and the massager didn't serve its purpose well.

Look wise superb colour and material good movement of the wheels are best doesn't make any sound super smooth but the back rest slider lever could be of more smoothness for handling the one and only thing was that the head rest pillow material was not foam instead it was of sponge type material and that too for that price of the chair it should be better and lastly the chair is very good and useful
N/A

Drogo gaming chair: If you are looking for a great gaming chair that people of all ages can enjoy, then the drogo gaming chair is the one for you. With its unique ergonomic design, you get maximum comfort when playing your favorite games, yet it is not at all heavy or expensive.
It's a chair that really lets you sink in.
Yeah i really like that chair for my office and gaming work
I've been using this item for more than a week so here's few of my pros and cons observed on the chair.
After setup recliner is not working. Please help.
The chair was easy to assemble and the looks are absolutely stunning. Happy to have one of these drogo gaming chairs.
Nice product with premium look, very much satisfied by the lumbar massager, neck support is adjustible, fine and supportive base, foot rest gives the recliner feel.
I'm a working professional and my height is 6 feet.
The massager is very useful and build quality very good. It took a bit more time to assemble .
This side support right below the handle are of metal and hurts if stretch ur legs, also the back cushion is very uncomfortable not worth 16k.
Totally comfortable. It was easy to assemble the chair and also all the features are nice. It's massager lumber support is working nice. Overall nice product
Good chair for gamers and awesome comfort for long time sitters, Good vibe in back and make me to sit long hours. Great product from the company, and the color is so premium
The chair is very comfortable and it looks like premium materials were used.

Ok, I received the product today and completed the assembling 2 hours ago. First of all, what a lovely unboxing and setup experience, just wow. Every steps are clearly written with numbering, every parts are with a premium finish, Just AMAZING. Regarding the product, it's the BEST. Good features, recliner works perfectly, and best and the most unexpected feature, is the back massager.  The feature s are perfect.
Likes:

It can be important for a gamer on the go to invest in the best gaming chairs. Sitting in front of your PC for long stretches at a time can cause neck, back, and shoulder pain. If you have chronic pain, it may disrupt your work schedule or prevent you from working altogether.
Value for money. Very comfortable

product_name: SAVYA HOME Apex Crusader XI Ergonomic Gaming Chair and Office Chair with Aluminium Base, Removable Headrest, 3D Armrest(PU Leather, Red & Black, 1 Piece)

reviews.review_text: Although assembling was bit tough but guidance provider by the seller was good. Overall you can call it a good buy

The chair looks beautiful . Not the softest foam but still good enough for me . Also mine broke after a year but the customer service was excellent . I sent them en email about thr issues , they called me and delivered the replacement oart to my home which i personally replaced . It shouldn't have broken in the first place but now i can say customer service is excellent .

This is a completely "assemble it yourself" chair. Didnt know this when ordered. Not an issue as assembling took about an hour, mostly to figure out how to do. Required screws and align keys are supplied. Chair itself is comfortable and good looking. Tilt lever is a little hard but not a problem. A larger support plate for the seat could have been better.
The Good:
Update 2, long term: The back broke, a weld came undone. The welding quality was very low,4mm thick welded ms should be able to sustain the strain from a person's weight for decades if not years
I've purchased this chair after searching on internet for a long time on 21st November, 2019.

what i loved about this chair is service provided by the company they at my door step the very same day of the delivery and not only that after gaming for over 6 hours i had no pain a very comfortable chair the only problem is it takes alot of time to assemble as screw's fittings are not done properly the side handles are very shaky but i think ignoring these small cons this is a chair worth it :D

I've been using this chair for months now, and I believe it is probably the best one I could have ordered off Amazon. I was initially hesitant, but decided to go with the positive reviews. Probably the best decision I ever took, I use it for reading on my study table as well as while playing games on my ps4. The best part for me probably are the hand supports, they are super adjustable and comfortably padded. I don't lean back on a regular basis, but I've tried lying down flat on it and it's super safe. The only way to topple it, I've found is to sit on the front edge and lean forward (and nobody expects you to do that lol).
Getting straight to the point. An average product with high expectations design. It is the design itself that attracts but otherwise it proved to be just like a 5k product.
N/A
Very comfortable chair. There are no defects up till now. The warranty period is also long (18 months), so I don't think I will have to worry about any defects in the future too.
Good.  Mostly assembled

Received this chair on 23/12/2021. The product has 1 year warrenty. But unfortunatly one of the caster wheel broken after 3 months of usage. I was bit worried and contacted SAVYA HOMES and for my surprise they arranged call instantly with technician. Technician asked details about damage and assured me that I will get a replacement. I requested them to send red colour which is matching with my chair other wheels but red was not available. So technician sent me all new 5 wheels of other colour which is of superb build quality. I am amazed with SAVYA homes warrenty support. If anyone want to buy product from them, go for it.
I'm Satisfied with the product

Chair is comfortable for the price point. Need the help of another person to assemble. A video would have been more helpful while assembling the chair. Support is available and any parts that need replacing/repair is done within 1 to 2 business days
The product was shipped very fast and was delivered well before the estimated delivery date.

I bought this chair back in December 2020. It was extremely comfortable. The armrest is slightly short but not a problem if you maintain good posture. The seat is comfortable and has shown almost no signs of wear in 10 months. The backrest, lumbar support are perfect. The neck-rest is slightly low for me, but it's adjustable.
This is a long time review. I have had this chair for about an year now.
There is a tear on the fabric. There is also a slight incline towards right. The back pillow clippers were not very well stitched
Received damaged Product.
The product feels good the only concerning thing for me was the time taken for delivery
Nice and Sturdy seatings. It was a bit damaged when it arrived.
A comfortable chair which can be used for long sitting hours job, nice back support and arm rest... Overall a very nice chair,  .. Very nice support from the company.

Been using for 10 months and the wheels broke away one by one within 4 months they replaced them but now in 10th month the replaced wheels started breaking and they replaced it again. Now the back rest is broken after a week. I have never seen such a cheap quality chair. Do not buy it. It's not worth 11k
Buyed this chair one month ago, one of it's leg broken today,  how someone can trust this brand? is this replaceable? I spent almost 13k..
Product is very well made, has aluminium bottom.
UPDATE;
N/A

Read it before you buy Genuine review: Chair build quality could have been better. The sitting cusion is really bad it could be more softer and bigger, but the cusion is really bad and not comfortable to sit for long hours it makes you sweat if you seat for more than 1 hour, The back support seams to be very good by picture, but it didn't made me feel good and my back pain is same as it was before I buyed this chair.  It is not easy to assemble the chair by yourself we have to call the support and they will send and they will force you to give 5 start rating that is really bad I told them I will only give a review after 1 month and here it is.

Got it an year back and had big issues. Just tighten the screws from time to time to reduce creaking. Had to replace a part after a year due to misuse from my side but the customer care was helpful in getting me the part at a reasonable price. Call them for faster response, number available on their website.

product_name: Chair Garage Multi-Functional Ergonomic Gaming Chair for Gamers with Lumbar Support|Fixed Arm Rest | Office | Work from Home | Ergonomic High Back Chair | Black & Maroon |
Vertagear S-Line SL1000 Racing Series Gaming Chair Black/Carbon Edition
SUNON Gaming Chair, Computer Chair with Footrest and Lumbar Support, Height Adjustable Gaming Chair with 360-Swivel Seat and Headrest for Office or Gaming

reviews.review_text: Not supportive to 5.11 or 6ft height guys... Body and lower part starts paining when yu use this and many health issue comes....
Good gaming chair in budget segmentüëçüëç
The foam used is of not good quality, then cover material is bad, it will spoil very easily and quickly.
It‚Äôs good
There are little scratches here and there.
it help very much in work from home . message feature also good

My work and performance has been affected I have to sit on the floor and work which in creating a problem in my work life just because of this chair. WORST experience I paid so much and this kind of pathetic chair.

Height adjustment is already not functioning properly its not even been a week now......hand rest is so weak I treat it like a baby and avoid touching it.....10k is not cheap at least deliver befitting the cost....material selection is horrible.... Just the looks are good

Product description is good. I bought it based on the decription. VEry easy to assemble. All functions of the chair are working properly. I used the chair for two hours and I realised that chair seat is not comfortable. I am returning the Chair. My heart is broekn because I bought this chair after lot of research.

The back support is good. The seat support is a little more on the thin side, hence it starts hurting for long seating sessions. The recline angle didnt work more than 135¬∞. Not sure if it is problem with my item. Overall if you are not too heavy I think it will be a good item for you.
The arm rest of chair , got broken automatically, the welding came out . And now i have no option left , either make this whole chair again or buy new one !!
Recieved just today. Took less than half an hour to assemble. My first impression is great. The material doesn't seem best. But at this price what you get. I got this at 9216/-.
everything looks good. except reclining angle. we get only 115 degree. cushion quality is not so great
Ive been using this for more than 2months, Cusion has shrinked , massager gets strucked everytime , hand supports has to be tighten weekly, sounds everytime when i sits or move.

The setup is simple, and the design is appealing. However, it is not very comfortable to use for an extended amount of time. The frames are not very stable. However, considering its price range, the product is satisfactory.

The quality of the product is very poor. The handle broke just in 4 months . The welding done is very poor. All parts are hardly attached. No local indian service provider. When contacted Amazon will simply point out the manufacturer  and when contacted they points out the seller. No one is taking ownership. The Amazon customer service team never take ownership and talk to the seller and manufacturer but it should be the case as we are trusted Amazon brand only.
Good gaming chair for 11k
A great product, one and only best professional gaming chair out there on amazon, satisfied with the fit and comfort of the product, we get a user manual for assembling which is super easy.

The product is good, but overall plastic body. Seller didn‚Äôt give Allen key to assemble the chair and screws for the handle to fit. I had to arrange locally. Sitting ergonomics is fantastic, enjoyable.
This chair is to small and doen't fit for adults and the hydrolick cylinder is not holding the load and going down by it own.
If you are look for ergonomic do take it . It‚Äôs just for the looks it has a massager and adjustable lumberjack but neck pillow is not comfortable at a right place
It's not very comfortable!! But looks nice!! It hurts my back after sitting on it for long!!
Very poor quality right hand handle
First of all, let me thank the seller to bring this product to India. I was looking for Similar product elsewhere but they were expensive. So kudos.
The package arrived on time but missing screws - L*4 (M6*20mm), M*3 (M6*35mm), N*4 (m8*30mm)
The 2 levers under the seat are kinda glitchy sometimes u have to push it 4-6 times in order to raise the seat ..

Quality of foam used is average foam on the hadels tends to compress, after every week usage should tight the bolts otherwise handles wobbel very much and recliner mechanism is also not that good but ok and the massager provided inside pillow stopped working from day 1 it just worked like 1 minute overall not value for money

It's a good product, I got it during some offers at around 9K, and for that price, it's an excellent product, it has some quality issues like the seat sinks in after some months of usage, the arms needs to be tightened and sometimes the back makes noise but see nothing is perfect, and I'm happy that i made this purchase

I've been using this chair for a little over 2 months and the comfort level on this is amazing. It's a lower back and neck cushion that supports the spine and posture. The massager in the lower back cushion is an amazing addition in this chair and provide the relaxation needed after a long day of work. In terms of assembly there was a quick guide that came along with it and I could manage to finish assembly within 20 mins. I would recommend this chair for anyone who spends hours at the computer and also looks forward to a bit of pampering.
Good product

product_name: Chair Garage Gaming Chair for Computer Table,Office Chair/Study Chair/Gaming Chair/Computer Chair for Home Work Executive mid Back

reviews.review_text: The chair was easy to assemble and very comfortable for long hours sitting. Took around 14 days to receive the product. But it was worth it!
Nice comfortable chair witb height adjustment and reclining. Comfortable for longer periods of work. Good thigh and back supportüëçüëçüëç
Comfortable sitting chair for a longer period of time. cushion is top notch.
Value for money

The chair is the worst investment I could've made. After 9 months...the base broke, replaced that. And now after a year the handles broke off along with the back. Please don't buy it. Save your money and get a branded chair.
Very comfortable and affordable product.. . This product has enhanced my gaming experience by providing long sitting hours without any kind of backache or difficulty... Value for money product.

product_name: Decor Gaming Racing and relaxing Chair Adjustable Seat Height High Back PU Leather Modern Ergonomic Chair E-sports Chair with Lumbar Support Retractable Foot rest Gaming Chair (Black and Blue) Gaming Chair
